casebody.data:
NU BETA ALUMNI ASSOCIATION OF PHI GAMMA DELTA, PLAINTIFF-APPELLANT, v. THE CITY OF NEW BRUNSWICK, DEFENDANT-RESPONDENT. Superior Court of New Jersey Appellate Division Argued March 20, 1985 Decided April 10, 1985.

Before Judges MATTHEWS and FURMAN.

Joseph M. Pinto argued the cause for appellant {Joseph F. Polino, attorney). *659Ralph F. Stanzione argued the cause for respondent. PER CURIAM.

The opinion of the Tax Court is affirmed for the reasons expressed by Judge Andrew in his comprehensive reported opinion at 7 N.J.Tax 379 (Tax Ct.1984) dated May 22, 1984.
